il.ac.hit.couponstorem.model

Class CartTimerThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • il.ac.hit.couponstorem.model.CartTimerThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class CartTimerThread
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    This class implements a timer thread that operates in the background . The thread is counting up to expire date of a given coupon, and upon that time sets the permissions to delete the coupon and remove it from the cart.
    Author:
    nadav

      • isExpiered

        public boolean isExpiered(java.util.Date currTime,
                 java.util.Date exTime)
        This method counts up the from the current time ,from the first time the coupon has been added to the cart , until the set date for expire.
        Parameters:
        currTime - the currTime is the current time in milliseconds.
        exTime - exTime is the expire date in milliseconds.
        Returns:
        true when time expire.
